value.title: Add Leading Zeros to a Number in Power BI Using Power Query

A common example of this is to create a month-year combination code using both month and year, and making sure the month is always two digits, regardless of being 1 or 12. value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query

value.title: Create Row Number for Each Group in Power BI using Power Query
